name: Stay On Board
description:
This game features motion sickness without even using VR

A game about boat flying to space due to the weather [insert physics proof here] and the player trying to stay on it, with bad control and collision spicing up the challenge!

Control:

  • WASD/arrows to move
  • Space or click to jump
  • scroll to zoom in/out
  • move mouse to move camera

Goal:

  • Stay on board even if the boat is going to space (your score is your altitude)

This game was made in 10 days, by me, Tim Krief, for the dragonjam2017. The theme was space and sea, so here's a boat which goes to space. It's my first game in 3D and I am proud of it...
